name: dna-monitor
description: A simple device monitoring tool for e-cigarettes with Evolv DNA chipset :cloud: :chart_with_upwards_trend: Works with macOS and Linux

packageJSON.name: dna-monitor
packageJSON.description: A simple macOS device monitoring tool for e-cigarettes with Evolv DNA chipset

releases.name: v0.9.0
releases.body: - add option to enable/disable chart clearing on every puff

releases.name: v0.6.0
releases.body:
- Application menu
- Detailed statistics
- Timing optimization, faster polling frequency

releases.name: v0.5.0
releases.body:
- persist visible series
- persist window state

releases.name: v0.4.0
releases.body:
- chart live resistance
- show cold resistance
- show idle battery voltage

releases.name: v0.2.0
releases.body:
- show device infos
- temperature OFF support
- prevent timeouts, 5ms pause between each command
- fix #1

releases.name: v0.0.4
releases.body: - Vertical resize of chart on window resizing

releases.name: v0.0.3
releases.body:
- search for DNA device, handle serialport disconnect/reconnect
- use photonkit for styling
